entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light late this morning. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
